item.title: 最大子序和
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 最大子序和 https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/maximum-subarray/ 一开始直接暴力，结果tle了最后 class Solution: def maxSubArray(nums): res = -float('inf') for i in range(len(nums)): for j in range(i,len(nums)): res = max(res,sum(nums[i:j+1])) return res 这说明在leetcode尽量不要嵌套循环，大概率Tle class
